body_html:
I would recommend working with us to define the interface and design that looks like gradients. That would be a nice contribution!

Ideally, we would have a check that things don't go out of sync with python.
body_text:
I would recommend working with us to define the interface and design that looks like gradients. That would be a nice contribution!
Ideally, we would have  a check that things don't go out of sync with python.
body:
I would recommend working with us to define the interface and design that looks like [gradients](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/cc/gradients). That would be a nice contribution!

Ideally, we would have  a check that things don't go out of sync with python.
